about-outline: Pepper VPN is a high-speed VPN app for the Shadowsocks and Xray protocols. Pepper VPN helps you use the Internet anonymously and securely.
auto-connect-dialog-detail: If you don't disconnect, it will automatically reconnect the next time you turn on your device
error-feedback-submission: Sorry, we were unable to submit your feedback. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error-invalid-access-key: Invalid access key. Please try again, or reach out to your server administrator
error-server-incompatible: Sorry, this access key is not compatible with this version of server.
error-timeout: Something takes longer than expected. Restart the app to resolve the problem. Please reach out to your server administrator.
error-unexpected: Sorry, an unexpected error occurred. Restart the app to resolve the problem. Please reach out to your server administrator.
error-shadowsocks-unsupported-cipher: The server you're trying to add uses a potentially unsafe cipher ({cipher}). Please reach out to your server administrator.
feedback-language-disclaimer: Please be aware that our team can only respond to feedback in English.
feedback-thanks: Thanks for your input! We're diving into it shortly.
non-system-vpn-warning-detail: While most browsers connect to VPN automatically, some do not.
outline-plugin-error-admin-permissions: VPN requires admin permissions to initialize. If you lack these permissions, please restart your computer or contact your system administrator for assistance.
outline-plugin-error-antivirus: Your antivirus software appears to be blocking our connection.
outline-plugin-error-invalid-server-cred: It seems like your access key is not valid. If this happens again, please contact your server administrator.
outline-plugin-error-routing-tables: We were not able to configure your routing tables successfully. If this happens again, please reach out to us.
outline-plugin-error-server-unreachable: We can't connect to your server. Ensure you're online and try again.
outline-plugin-error-system-configuratio: Sorry, it looks like VPN is not properly installed. Please try reinstalling. If that doesn’t work, please, reach out to your server administrator
outline-plugin-error-udp-forwarding-not-: It seems like this server doesn’t support UDP forwarding. If this happens again, please contact your server administrator.
outline-plugin-error-unsupported-routing: It seems like another VPN is active. Please disconnect it and try again.
outline-plugin-error-vpn-permission-not-: VPN requires your permission to establish a server connection. Please retry or reach out with feedback if you need assistance.
outline-services-installation-confirmati: Initiating VPN may need admin permissions. Would you like to proceed?
outline-services-installation-failed: Sadly, we can't initiate VPN. Please share your feedback through the app.
outline-services-installed: VPN has been successfully initialized. Go ahead and connect to the server.
privacy-text: When you submit feedback, experience an app error or crash, or if your server administrator chooses to share anonymous server usage data, some technical information is sent.
privacy-title: VPN will never collect your personal information
server-add-instructions: Copy and paste an access key to add a server
server-add-invalid: {openLine}The key isn't working. Reach out to your server administrator{closeLine}
server-detected: Please confirm that you want to add this server
update-downloaded: An updated version of Pepper VPN has been downloaded. It will be installed when you restart Pepper VPN
launch-window-message:
The application runs in the background mode.

To enable VPN, click on the icon on the top bar
help-view-text: If you have any questions, please reach out to your server administrator.
